How to learn with us

What makes us different?

Get quality courses with us with the best price. We have top mentors around the globe.

Trusted content

Our platform is built on the foundation of reliable and up-to-date content. We collaborate with industry experts and experienced professionals to deliver trusted information that reflects the latest trends and advancements in the tech field. You can rely on us to provide you with accurate and relevant knowledge.

Flexible courses

We understand that everyone has different schedules and commitments. That's why we offer flexible courses that fit seamlessly into your lifestyle. Our self-paced learning modules allow you to study at your own convenience, whether you prefer to dive in intensively or take it one step at a time. We're here to adapt to your needs.

Learn with experts

Our platform connects you with industry experts who are passionate about supporting your journey. You'll have access to mentors, participate in engaging discussions, and collaborate on projects, creating opportunities for growth and networking.

Get certified

We believe in recognizing your achievements. Upon completing our courses, you'll have the opportunity to earn industry-recognized certifications. These certifications not only validate your newly acquired skills but also serve as a valuable asset when pursuing new job opportunities. Gain the confidence and credibility you need to succeed in the tech industry.

Why choose us

Choose your path to success with our flexible learning options

At Tech Leap, our goal is to develop well-rounded tech professionals who are equipped with both the professional and technical skills that enable them to thrive in the most in-demand, high growth industries.

Frequently asked questions

What is techleap?

Tech leap is a platform that helps people transition into the tech industry with the aim of providing them with the resources and support regardless of their background or prior experience.

What do I need to start learning?

To start learning with us, all you need is a computer or laptop with internet access. We provide the necessary course materials and resources on our online platform, making it convenient for you to dive into the world of tech from anywhere.

How many courses can I take at a time?

We encourage you to focus on one course at a time to ensure a comprehensive learning experience. Each course is designed to cover specific skills and knowledge, allowing you to build a solid foundation step by step. Once you have successfully completed one course, you can move on to the next to expand your expertise.

How long do I need to get my certification?

The duration to obtain your certification varies depending on the course you choose and your learning pace. Our courses are designed to be flexible, allowing you to learn at your own speed. On average, most learners complete their certification within a few months, but you can take more or less time based on your preferences and availability.dless of their background or prior experience.

Are there physical learning centers?

Currently, we operate as an online learning platform, so we don't have physical learning centers. Our virtual environment offers a seamless and accessible learning experience, enabling you to study from the comfort of your own home or any location that suits you best.

Is there a mentorship program?

Yes, we offer a mentorship program to support your learning journey. We’ve partnered with industry professionals to help you navigate through challenges, provide career advice, and support your growth in the tech industry.
